nodes.text: Skorrupon was a planet located in the Trans-Vulta sector of the Mid Rim.

In the Battle of Skorrupon, Arani Korden, Rorworr, and Deel Surool intercepted High Inquisitor Volytar's shuttle outside of his personal Star Destroyer. The three became known as the Heroes of Skorrupon.
Rebel forces attempted to ambush the newly christened Super Star Destroyer, Executor, in the space above the planet, shortly after the Battle of Yavin.
Skorrupon was attacked by the Yuuzhan Vong during the Yuuzhan Vong War.
